text: Steering the Craft: Exercises and Discussions on Story Writing for the Lone Mariner and the Mutinous Crew is a 1998 nonfiction book by Ursula K. Le Guin. The book started as a writers' workshop led by Le Guin. There self-guided exercises and discussions in the book about how to write stories. ==References== == Other websites == * excerpt at Le Guin's site * Category:1998 books Category:Writing Category:Books by Ursula K. Le Guin
title: Steering the Craft
